note.p: Birth: Innerteil, near Kinghorn, Fife, Scotland (1630)
Education: St Andrews; Kings College, Aberdeen; MA (1646)

Career: Supported Charles II (1653); in exile on the Continent (1654-1660); Lord of Session (1661); MP for Ross in the Scottish Parliament; Lord Justice General of Scotland (1678); Privy councillor (Scotland) (1678); Lord Clerk Register (1681); Chief Minister in Scotland (1682-1688); Secretary of State (1702-1704); Lord Justice General (1705-1710)
Honours: Viscount Tarbat 1685; Earl of Cromarty 1703
